item.title: Re: Sabo damage question.
item.content:encoded: Repairs aren't automatic. The leader has a link on the right side somewhere around the amount of ryo available for repairs which they actually have to go into to repair the damage. Otherwise, the damage will accumulate and worsen as time goes on, if left untended to.

item.title: Re: Sabo damage question.
item.content:encoded:
Sabotage damage only happens in two cases:

  • Kaiju inflict damage each day they are not defeated
  • When a village specifically goes out of their way to sabotage you when they raid or invade.

Normal raids/invasions inflict zero damage. That said, haveing some Ryo banked in repairs is a good idea for when you do eventually get sabotaged by a village or kaiju.
